owunge dhana parithyaga nolabuni nam etharam wishala alankara bauddha wiharayak kwalalampur aganuwara idi nowannata ida thibini. 2006 di athipujya aacharya kirinde shri dhammananda, nahimiyan ge apawathwimen pasu ema hidasa pirawimata wathman wiharadhipathi kirinde dhammarathana nahimiyan ganu labana uthsahaya behewinma pasasum katayuthu ya.dharma grantha liyawa mudranaya kota lokaya pura prachalitha karawima dinapatha dharma deshana, dharma sakachcha pawathwima, dharmaya iganwime panthi, bhawana saha mal pahan puja aadiyada itha aadarshawath lesath, chiththakarshaniya lesath, brikpild bauddha wiharaya mul karagena siduwe.
